url.description: The API URL to fetch more details about this project column.

project_url.description: The URL to view the project associated with this column.

cards_url.description: The API URL to fetch the cards in this project column.

id.description: The unique identification number of this project column.

node_id.description: The node ID of this project column used in the GraphQL API.

name.description: The name given to this project column.

created_at.description: The date and time when this project column was created.

updated_at.description: The date and time when this project column was last updated.

repository.description: The repository to which this project column belongs.

project_id.description: The ID of the project to which this column belongs.
